tossup_question: -   –  Which of the following methods would be most accurate when determining the molecular weight of a polymer?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Freezing-point depression analysis
X) Gravimetry
Y) Titration
Z) Osmometry
bonus_question: -   –  Chromium metal crystallizes in a body-centered cubic lattice. What is the coordination number of each chromium atom in this lattice?
